What’s happening in BigQuery: New federated queries, easier ML, and more metadata
BigQuery, Google Cloud’s petabyte-scale data warehouse, lets you ingest and analyze data quickly and with high availability, so you can find new insights, trends, and predictions to efficiently run your business.
